synopsis.text: Abandoned and left to grapple with the complexities of human emotions, two robots, Haru and Natsu, find themselves under the care of a benevolent scientist named Masa. Haru, ever curious and hopeful, yearns to understand the profound concept of love and what it means to be human. Meanwhile, Natsu, scarred by their previous abandonment, wrestles with darker thoughts, fearing the possibility of being discarded once again. As they navigate their new life, the pair embarks on a poignant journey of self-discovery, constantly questioning: what does love truly mean?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
